alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 5:20PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bradley, southeastern Cleveland, eastern Calhoun and west central Drew Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marks Mill State Park, or 12 miles northwest of Warren, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren... Wilmar... Marks Mill State Park... Ellisville... Weeks... Hebron... Tipton... Carmel... Orlando... New Edinburg... Sumpter... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
